definitions.definition: The total, aggregate or sum of material (not applicable to discrete numbers or units or items in standard English).
definitions.example: The amount of atmospheric pollution threatens a health crisis.
Pour a small amount of water into the dish.

definitions.definition: (sometimes proscribed) The number (the sum) of elements in a set.
(followed by to) To total or evaluate.
definitions.example: It amounts to three dollars and change.

definitions.definition: (followed by to) To be the same as or equivalent to.
definitions.example: He was a pretty good student, but never amounted to much professionally.
